title: The library of choice literature :
snippet: "My father is not at home," said the young lady of the house to Hume; "nevertheless they must abide here all night, for I can easily see that boy is unable to travel farther this evening: and besides they are of my own native country.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Edinburgh Castle was surrendered, not without suspicion of grosstreachery; and Tantallon, Hume, Roslin, and Borthwick, with other fortresses,fell into their hands.

title: Journal of a Summer Tour in the Perthshire and Inverness-shire Highlands
author: Roger, James Cruikshank.
